ygData.subject: Re: SOW rings?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the ring you get in rivervale is the squad ring.. it has 1 charge of greater heal and then you have to get it recharged again. No that is not the SoW ring
ygData.messageBody:
Well the ring you get in rivervale is the squad ring..
it has 1 charge of greater heal and then you have to get it recharged
again.
No that is not the SoW ring

On Wed, 2 Jun 1999, James Schuldes wrote:

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Someone showed me two quests in Rivervale - one he thought was for the SoW -
> he kept saying he would me 25pp if I got it for him - not sure if his
> faction was bad or what that he could not do it himself. I don't know if it
> is charged nor if it is re-chargeable. Also, I am not sure that he had his
> facts straight or was going on hearsay. But he kept asking about the SoW
> ring.
>
> Snyak
> Warrior of the 10th Level
> Freeport, Antonica 53226
> Innoruuk
> "The opinions expressed herein are my own and do not
> necessarily reflect those of my Guild Master nor my Deity."
>
>
> -----Original Message-----

> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] SOW rings?
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Thanks for the info but someone on this list claimed to have
> something
> called an SoW ring. Im curious to learn about this piece of
> jewelry.
>
> Jaade D'Vinn
> Indigo Sista Soldier
>
> > ----------
> > From: BRUCEoLEE@...[SMTP:BRUCEoLEE@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 12:58 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] SOW rings?
> >
> > From: BRUCEoLEE@...
> >
> > JourneyMan boots are unlimited charge. they cannot be
> sold,traded or
> > dropped.
> > you do not have to wear them. you only need then in your
> inventory. just
> > right click on them and off you go.
> >
> >
> > Beretta,Fennin Ro
> >
